We got this bill passed in the Senate Commerce Committee and need to get it to the Senate floor for a vote. That way all of rural America, including Sharla in Big Sandy, can FaceTime the ones they love without interruption.

My Broadband DATA Act helps to fix this - it allows us to get accurate data about the places that need broadband coverage improvement most, so that we're making sure we're not leaving rural communities behind.

My best days in the Senate are when I get to FaceTime Sharla. However, spotty broadband coverage makes it hard to connect to rural places like our farm. We must get politics out of the exam room and allow patients to make their own choices about their health care. 

We must #ProtectX.

This gag rule prevents Title X grantees like @PPFA from doing their jobs‚Äîgiving comprehensive information and potentially life-saving care to patients. 

This rule will prevent folks from all over‚Äîincluding those in rural areas‚Äîfrom accessing the health care they need.

.@PPFA serves 40% of patients nationwide who receive care through Title X-funded centers. The Administration‚Äôs gag rule prohibits health care providers who receive Title X funding from informing patients about how or where they can access reproductive care. 

That‚Äôs wrong.
